Docs.summary: Describes the kernel used to create the effect.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration specifies the curve that is used to calculate the blur.
**Performance Note:** A Gaussian kernel creates a higher-quality blur but if performance is a concern, use the Box kernel because it uses less calculations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Effects.KernelType Box = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A simple blur created with a square distribution curve.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Effects.KernelType Gaussian = int32(0)
